summary: Implemented complete local archive fallback system for session retrieval. Added intelligent fallback logic, enhanced caching, defensive error handling, and Shadow archive management.
key_decisions: Use local Shadow archives as fallback when Notion unavailable. Implement multi-layer caching (sessions, searches, agent history). Add comprehensive testing for all fallback scenarios.
